text: Gajar Gola railway station () is located in Gajar Gola village, Hafizabad district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Gujranwala District Category:Railway stations on Khanewal–Wazirabad Line
title: Gajar Gola railway station
